Definition at line 40 of file IVersionInfo.h.

enum iser::IVersionInfo::VersionId

Type of version.

This is needed for the sake of supporting mutliply separated versions for separated modules. Whole ACF framework lay under single versioning mechanism and has one version number identified by FrameworkVersionId type ID. User version type ID should be greater or equal UserVersionId value. As a default version type ID for user applications UserVersionId should be used.

Enumerator:
FrameworkVersionId 
UserVersionId
